definition: carpenter's plane/to plane (woodwork)/to shave off/to peel (with a potato peeler etc)
to dig/to excavate/(coll.) to exclude/not to count/to deduct/to subtract
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: This paper studies on the relationship between the Ma Wusu sands control and particle board′s building.
sentences.chinese: 本文論述了毛烏素沙地治理與刨花板廠建設的關係。

sentences.english: The paper introduced the working principle and design calculation of the clamp frames for cement bonded particle board production.
sentences.chinese: 介紹水泥刨花板夾緊框架的工作原理和設計思路。

sentences.english: In this study, various coupling agents were also used to improve strength of particleboard.
sentences.chinese: 施加偶聯劑也可以提高玻璃纖維布增強刨花板的強度。

sentences.english: The interal bonding strength of the layers of the overlayed boards were tested, and result was satisfactory.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，石膏刨花板具有良好的飾面性能。

sentences.english: Boring and sizing paper laminated chipboard and MDF panels.
sentences.chinese: 用於貼面刨花板和中密度板的鑽孔和裁切。

sentences.english: The proper-ties of particleboard depend on a variety of influencing factors.
sentences.chinese: 刨花板的性能與許多工藝因素有關。

sentences.english: Sorption saturation point (SSP) was the critical moisture content for hygroscopic deformation of RSPB.
sentences.chinese: 吸着飽和點SSP是刨花板吸溼變形的臨界含水率。

sentences.english: They have some significant meanings for further promoting oriented strand board.
sentences.chinese: 這對進一步推動定向刨花板的發展具有重要意義。

sentences.english: The processing equipments for the oriented structural board are designed as well.
sentences.chinese: 設計出定向結構刨花板生產工藝中刨片加工設備。

sentences.english: Manufacturing wood-cement composites by adding fly ash was successful.
sentences.chinese: 以粉煤灰替代部分水泥生產水泥刨花板。

sentences.english: The processes of manufacturing wood-plastics particleboard with glass fibre reinforced plastic as its outer were explored.
sentences.chinese: 研究了用玻璃鋼作錶板製造木塑刨花板的製造工藝。

sentences.english: Some suggestions are made about how to select equipment for new particleboard projects.
sentences.chinese: 爲新建刨花板項目及設備選型提出了一些建議。

sentences.english: It aims at making the board compete against others and improving the environment around us.
sentences.chinese: 旨在使我們的刨花板更具競爭力的同時改善周圍環境。

sentences.english: Bending strength is the main mechanical performance index for cemented chipboard.
sentences.chinese: 抗彎強度是水泥刨花板的主要力學性能指標。

definition: medium-density fiberboard (MDF)/abbr. to 中纖板|中纤板[zhong1 xian1 ban3]
pinyin: zhong1 mi4 du4 xian1 wei2 ban3

definition: acetal resin/Delrin/unplasticized polyvinyl chloride (uPVC or rigid PVC)
phenolic aldehyde/phenolic resin (used to manufacture bakelite)
